Texts.Chs: 难以置信，你成功地重新激活了核心！现在剩下的就是组装最后的武器了。
Texts.Eng: Incredible, you managed to reactivate the core! Now all that is left is to assemble the final weapon.

Texts.Chs: 现在是最困难的部分: 你需要重新激活那个武器核心。 你只能在^orange;跃迁门上行站^reset;这样做，但是这种地方存世极少。我听说有一个地方叫做^orange;伏后斯·阿瓦哈'拉斯^reset;，那里可能有这样一个站点。^green;也许你可以通过探索太空和寻找特殊的异常现象来找到它。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Now comes the hard part: you will need to reactivate that weapon core. You can only do so at a ^orange;Jumpgate Uplink Station^reset;, but few still exist. I have heard rumours of a place called ^orange;Vhos Avha'las ^reset;that might hold such a station. ^green;Perhaps you can find it by exploring space and looking for peculiar anomalies.^reset;
